name: boxify-react
description: A lightweight, performant React component library for building responsive layouts with CSS custom properties, smart defaults, and comprehensive TypeScript support

scripts.size: npm run build && node -e "console.log('Bundle sizes:'); console.log('CJS:', require('fs').statSync('dist/index.js').size + ' bytes'); console.log('ESM:', require('fs').statSync('dist/index.esm.js').size + ' bytes'); console.log('CSS:', require('fs').statSync('dist/index.css').size + ' bytes');"
scripts.size:gzip: npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const cjs = execSync('gzip -c dist/index.js | wc -c').toString().trim(); const esm = execSync('gzip -c dist/index.esm.js | wc -c').toString().trim(); const css = execSync('gzip -c dist/index.css | wc -c').toString().trim(); console.log('Gzipped sizes:'); console.log('CJS:', cjs + ' bytes'); console.log('ESM:', esm + ' bytes'); console.log('CSS:', css + ' bytes'); console.log('Total:', (parseInt(cjs) + parseInt(css)) + ' bytes');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test && npm run type-check
